adv.js:
<> {type_input !== "checkbox" && type_input !== "toggle" && type_input !== "datetime" && type_input !== "dropdown" && type_input !== "multiselect" && (
{children}
)}

<>
  {multiline === "false" ? (
    <input
      {...props}
      type={type_input}
      placeholder={label}
      spellCheck={false}
      value={
        bind_form && bind_key && type_input !== "date"
          ? bind_form[bind_key]
          : type_input === "date"
          ? value_date
          : value
      }
      style={{
        backgroundColor: disabled === "TRUE" ? "#f0f0f0" : "white",
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        minHeight: "46px",
      }}
      disabled={disabled === "TRUE" ? true : false}
      onChange={(e) => {
        const val = e.currentTarget.value;
        const b: any = bind_form;
        if (b && bind_key && type_input !== "date") {
          b[bind_key] = type_input === "number" ? Number(val) : val;
          b.render();
        }
        if (b && bind_key && type_input === "date") {
          b[bind_key] = new Date(val);
          b.render();
        }
      }}
    />
  ) : (
    <textarea
      {...props}
      spellCheck={false}
      placeholder={label}
      rows={Number(multiline_row)}
      value={bind_form && bind_key ? bind_form[bind_key] : value}
      style={{
        minHeight: "46px",
      }}
      onChange={(e) => {
        const val = e.currentTarget.value;
        const b: any = bind_form;
        if (b && bind_key) {
          b[bind_key] = val;
          b.render();
        }
      }}
    />
  )}
</>

<> {dropdown_expand === "on" && (
{(value_dropdown || []).map((item, idx) => (
{ const val = item; const b: any = bind_form; if (b && bind_key) { b[bind_key] = val; b[dropdown_open_key] = false; b.render(); } }} > {children}
))}
)}

<>
  <input
    type="date"
    placeholder={label}
    value={value_date}
    onChange={(e) => {
      console.log(bind_form[bind_key], "coba date");
      const val = e.target.value;
      const b: any = bind_form;
      if (b && bind_key) {
        b[bind_key] = new Date(val);
        b.render();
      }
    }}
    {...props}
  />
</>

<>
  <input
    type="time"
    value={value_time}
    onChange={(e) => {
      const val = e.target.value;
      const b: any = bind_form;
      const old_date = new Date(b[bind_key]);
      if (b && bind_key) {
        b[bind_key] = new Date(
          old_date.getFullYear(),
          old_date.getMonth(),
          old_date.getDate(),
          val.substring(0, 2),
          val.slice(-2)
        );
        b.render();
      }
    }}
    {...props}
  />
</>

<Multiselect
  // options={[
  //   { name: "Option 1", id: 1 },
  //   { name: "Option 2", id: 2 },
  // ]}
  options={value_dropdown}
  style={{
    multiselectContainer: {
      minWidth: "250px",
    },
    searchBox: {
      border: "none",
      minHeight: "40px",
    },
  }}
  placeholder={label}
  selectedValues={selected_dropdown}
  onSelect={(selectedList, selectedItem) => {
    const b: any = bind_form;
    if (b && bind_key) {
      b[bind_key] = selectedList;
      b.render();
    }
  }}
  onRemove={(selectedList, removedItem) => {
    const b: any = bind_form;
    if (b && bind_key) {
      b[bind_key] = selectedList;
      b.render();
    }
  }}
  displayValue="label"
/>

<button
  {...props}
  style={{
    backgroundColor:
      type_button === "Success"
        ? "green"
        : type_button === "Edit"
        ? "#FFFFFF"
        : type_button === "Danger"
        ? "#ffffff"
        : type_button === "Checkout"
        ? "#159895"
        : type_button === "Disabled"
        ? "gray"
        : "#0062A3",
    border:
      type_button === "Edit"
        ? "2px solid #002B5B"
        : type_button === "Danger"
        ? "2px solid #870707"
        : "0px",
    borderRadius: type_button === "Checkout" ? "20px" : "10px",
    width: type_button === "Checkout" ? "100px" : "250px",
  }}
  type={type_button === "Submit" ? "submit" : "button"}
  onClick={(e) => {
    if (type_button !== "Disabled") {
      if (action === "navigate") {
        navigate(navigate_link);
      } else {
        action_function();
      }
    }
  }}
>
  {children}
</button>

<button
  {...props}
  style={{
    backgroundColor:
      type_button === "Success"
        ? "green"
        : type_button === "Edit"
        ? "#FFFFFF"
        : type_button === "Danger"
        ? "#ffffff"
        : type_button === "Checkout"
        ? "#159895"
        : type_button === "Disabled"
        ? "gray"
        : "#0062A3",
    border:
      type_button === "Edit"
        ? "2px solid #002B5B"
        : type_button === "Danger"
        ? "2px solid #870707"
        : "0px",
    borderRadius: type_button === "Checkout" ? "20px" : "10px",
    width: type_button === "Checkout" ? "100px" : "250px",
  }}
  type={type_button === "Submit" ? "submit" : "button"}
  onClick={(e) => {
    if (type_button !== "Disabled") {
      if (action === "navigate") {
        navigate(navigate_link);
      } else {
        action_function();
      }
    }
  }}
>
  {children}
</button>
